items.title: Sharge’s MagSafe ICEMAG 10K 15W power bank is down at $50, but here’s why you should get the new 25W model instead
items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, Sharge is offering its ICEMAG 2 10,000mAh 15W MagSafe Power Bank back at $49.90 shipped, but for $17 more you can grab the brand new one that delivers all that and more – its newest 25W descendant is currently down at its lowest price of $67.91 shipped in black or white after clipping the on-page 15% off coupon. What’s particularly nice about the deal on the newer model is the FREE 4.9-foot 240W USB-C charging cable you’ll be getting too, which only sweetens the pot.

items.summary:
DREAM PAIRS Cozy Foam Slippers

Buy for $10 (Reg. $23)

Apply code RMSE7YUA during checkout.

What we love

Many of us still have to put up with cold winter weather for 2-3 months. Bearing that in mind, I think it’s a great idea to embrace the season and stay cozy when at home. These slippers can help, and I really like that they are machine washable.

You can pre-order directly from Anker’s online store for $29.99 shipped, securing a $10 launch discount. Even at its full $40 asking price, this is Anker’s most affordable charger with a built-in display, which makes the early discount an even better value. It’s available in four finishes, including one that pairs perfectly with the Cosmic Orange iPhone 17 Pro models, so be sure to jump in and grab one after checking out the full details below.

items.title: U.S. consumer sentiment rises slightly in January: survey
items.summary: NEW YORK, Jan. 9 (Xinhua) -- The U.S. Consumer Sentiment Index rose to 54 in January 2026, according to a preliminary reading released Friday by the University of Michigan (UM) Surveys of Consumers, up from the final reading of 52.9 in December 2025 but below last January's 71.7. items.title: Power winter adventures with Bluetti’s Pioneer Na(Sodium) station at exclusive $759 pricing (Reg. $999), more
items.summary:
Bluetti currently has a winter backup sale running that is seeing up to 57% discounts across a lineup of power solutions – and our readers can currently score some exclusive extra savings, too. To cover your winter outdoor activities, you can find options like Bluetti’s new Pioneer Na(Sodium) Portable Power Station at $759.05 shipped, after using the exclusive code 9TO5TOYS5OFF at checkout. Since its release in mid-October at $999, we’ve consistently seen this model drop down to $799 during sales, which fell as low as $735 with the exclusive 8% off code we had during Black Friday and Christmas sales. If you missed your chance for that all-time low, you’re getting the next-best price here while the sale continues, saving you a total $240 off the going rate and giving you a cold-proof source of power during winter outings. Head below to browse the full lineup of notable deals we’re seeing while they’re still around.

Today’s deal shaves $14 off its usual going rate, marking the return of the lowest price it first hit shortly after its debut last year. Discounts on this charger have been few and far between – it didn’t even receive a meaningful cut during Black Friday – so this deal is particularly worth considering if you’ve been eyeing a new charger. You can also get this in black and white colors, and they’re both down to the $36 low today. Head below for more details.
